CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "SMB"),
IF(Account.Last_Call__c > NOW() - 3 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green"), IF(Account.Last_Call__c > NOW() - 7 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red"))),
IF(Account.Last_Call__c > NOW() - 7 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green"), IF(Account.Last_Call__c > NOW() - 14 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red")))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green Light = customer was called in the last 3 days (CML) and 7 days (MM/Ent) Yellow Light = customer was called 4-7 days ago (CML) and 8-14 days ago (MM/Ent) Red Light = customer has not been called in over 7 days (CML) and 14 days (MM/Ent)
CustomField.label: Last Call Status
